H0.text: In the Bible, who did the sun and moon stand still before. Moses

H1.text: In the Bible, who did the sun and moon stand still before. Elijah

H2.text: In the Bible, who did the sun and moon stand still before. Elisha

H3.text: In the Bible, who did the sun and moon stand still before. يوشع

A4.text: the staying of the sun and moon (meaning that 'the day was lengthened') demonstrated that YHWH, not Joshua, had the full control of even the heavenly bodies in the defeat of the southern kings

A5.text: defeated with Yahweh's miraculous help of stopping the Sun and the Moon, and hurling down large hailstones (Joshua 10:10–14)
